add_subscription.q: How do I add a new subscription?
add_subscription.a: Tap the ‚Äú+‚Äù button on the dashboard, select a service or create a custom one, enter the price and renewal date, then save.

edit_subscription.q: How can I edit or update a subscription?
edit_subscription.a: Open the subscription from the dashboard and tap ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù. You can change the price, billing interval, category, or renewal date.

renewal_reminders.q: How do I set up renewal reminders?
renewal_reminders.a: Renewal reminders are automatic. Trakio tracks renewal dates and shows upcoming payments in advance.

currencies.a: Yes. Each subscription can have its own currency. You can also set a base currency in settings.

backup_data.q: How do I back up my data?
backup_data.a: Go to Settings ‚Üí Data Management to export your subscriptions and payment history as CSV or JSON.

premium_features.q: What features are included in Premium?
premium_features.a: Premium includes analytics, budget management, payment history export, notifications, and advanced insights.

delete_subscription.q: How do I delete a subscription?
delete_subscription.a: Swipe a subscription to the left or open it and tap ‚ÄúDelete‚Äù.

custom_categories.a: Yes. Custom categories are available with Premium.

premium.expires_notice: Premium expires on {{date}}. You can resubscribe at any time.
premium.expired_notice: Premium has expired. Upgrade to regain access.

payment.failed_notice: Payment failed. Please update your payment info to keep Premium access.

projection.title: Forecast for {{range}}
projection.description: Estimated expenses based on your recent subscription payments.

widerruf.title: Right of Withdrawal
widerruf.right.title: Right of Withdrawal
widerruf.right.text1: Consumers have the right to withdraw from this contract within fourteen days without giving any reason.
widerruf.right.text2: The withdrawal period is fourteen days from the day the contract is concluded.
widerruf.exercise.title: Exercising the Right of Withdrawal
widerruf.exercise.text: To exercise your right of withdrawal, you must inform us (Trakio, Kassel, Germany, Email: support@trakio.de) of your decision by means of a clear statement (e.g. by email).
widerruf.exclusion.title: Exclusion of the Right of Withdrawal for Digital Content
widerruf.exclusion.text: The right of withdrawal expires early if we have started to execute the contract after you have expressly agreed that we may begin execution before the withdrawal period has expired, and you have confirmed your knowledge that you lose your right of withdrawal by agreeing.
impressum.title: Legal Notice
impressum.subtitle: Provider Identification
impressum.provider.title: Provider
impressum.address.name: PLEASE ENTER YOUR FULL NAME
impressum.contact.title: Contact
impressum.vat.title: VAT Information
impressum.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
impressum.disclaimer.text: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Information about processing personal data
privacy.1.title: 1. Controller
privacy.1.name: PLEASE ENTER YOUR FULL NAME
privacy.2.title: 2. What data do we process?
privacy.2.p1: When using the app, we process in particular:
privacy.2.li1: Account data (e.g., email address, login token).
privacy.2.li2: App content (e.g., subscriptions, categories, payment data/history, settings).
privacy.2.li3: Technical data (e.g., IP address, device/browser data, log data), as required for operation and security.
privacy.3.title: 3. Purposes & Legal Basis
privacy.3.p1: We process data for the following purposes:
privacy.3.li1: Providing app functionality and managing accounts.
privacy.3.li2: Storing and syncing your subscription data.
privacy.3.li4: IT security, fraud prevention, and error analysis.
privacy.3.legal: Legal bases include Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (contract/account), Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest, e.g. security), and Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR (consent), where provided.
privacy.4.title: 4. Recipients / Service Providers
privacy.4.p1: We use service providers (processors) to reliably operate the app:
privacy.4.note: See the privacy policies of these providers:
privacy.5.title: 5. Data Retention
privacy.5.p1: We store your data only as long as necessary to provide the app and for the stated purposes. You can remove your account and app data by deleting your account (if implemented). Legal retention obligations (e.g. for payment data) remain unaffected.
privacy.6.title: 6. Your Rights
privacy.6.p1: You have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, data portability, and object to processing under applicable legal conditions.
privacy.6.p2: You can also lodge a complaint with a data protection authority. In Hessen, this is the 'Hessische Beauftragte f√ºr Datenschutz und Informationsfreiheit'.
privacy.7.title: 7. Contact
privacy.7.p1: If you have questions about how your data is processed, contact us at
agb.title: Terms & Conditions (AGB)
agb.1.title: 1. Scope
agb.1.p1: These Terms and Conditions (AGB) govern the use of the web-based software "Trakio" for managing subscriptions and recurring expenses.
agb.1.p2: The provider is the service provider named in the legal notice (Impressum). These terms apply to consumers as defined by ¬ß 13 BGB.
agb.2.title: 2. Subject Matter
agb.2.p1: Trakio provides a digital application for users to manage their subscriptions, expenses, and payment intervals.
agb.2.p2: The provider does not guarantee financial success or savings, only the provision of the software as it is currently available.
agb.3.title: 3. Registration and User Account
agb.3.p1: Using Trakio requires registration with a valid email address. Users must keep their login credentials confidential.
agb.3.p2: The provider may suspend or delete accounts that violate these terms or applicable laws.
agb.4.title: 4. Scope of Services and Availability
agb.4.p1: The provider aims for high availability but does not guarantee uninterrupted access at all times.
agb.4.p2: Maintenance, security updates, or technical issues may cause temporary limitations.
agb.5.title: 5. Free Use and Premium Subscription
agb.5.p1: Trakio is available in a free basic version. Certain features require a paid premium subscription.
agb.5.p2: Billing is handled via the payment provider Stripe.
agb.6.title: 6. Trial Period
agb.6.p1: The provider may offer a free trial period. After the trial, the subscription converts to a paid one if the user confirms.
agb.7.title: 7. Payment, Term, and Cancellation
agb.7.p1: Subscriptions are billed monthly or yearly in advance. You can cancel anytime through the customer portal.
agb.7.p2: Cancellation becomes effective at the end of the current billing period.
agb.8.title: 8. Right of Withdrawal
agb.8.p1: Consumers have a legal right of withdrawal. This right may expire for digital content if the user consents to begin before the withdrawal period ends.
agb.9.title: 9. User Obligations
agb.9.p1: Users must use Trakio in compliance with applicable laws. Abuse or attempts to manipulate the service are prohibited.
agb.10.title: 10. Liability
agb.10.p1: The provider is fully liable for intent and gross negligence.
agb.10.p2: For slight negligence, liability applies only if essential contractual obligations are breached.
agb.10.p3: Liability for data loss is excluded where legally permitted.
agb.11.title: 11. Data Protection
agb.11.p1: Personal data is processed in accordance with the GDPR. See the Privacy Policy for details.
agb.12.title: 12. Changes to the Terms
agb.12.p1: The provider may amend these terms for valid reasons. Users will be informed of significant changes.
agb.13.title: 13. Final Provisions
agb.13.p1: The laws of the Federal Republic of Germany apply. If any provision is invalid, the remaining provisions remain unaffected.
